AMSTERDAM (AP) The European Medicines Agency says it has started an expedited evaluation on whether to recommend a booster dose of the coronavirus vaccine made by Pfizer-BioNTech.

articles.title: EU shambles: VDL forced to defend bloc's integrity as Macron fails to tackle fake passes - Daily Express
articles.description: URSULA VON DER LEYEN's European Commission was forced to defend its Covid Green Pass policy after reports of falsified certificates in France put the integrity of the EU into question.

articles.author: James Paton
articles.title: Rich nations will have 1.2 billion doses they don’t need - News24
articles.description: The US, Britain, European nations and others could satisfy their own needs and still have large quantities to redistribute globally, according to London-based analytics firm Airfinity.
